description.p: Agenda is a simple, slick, speedy and no-nonsense task manager. Use it to keep track of the tasks that matter most.

ul.li: Remembers your list until you clear completed tasks

description.p: I dare you to find an easier, faster, more beautiful task manager for elementary OS.
